body:

title: [AMA] Juanooo

replies.body:
I've noticed you became less toxic, and a nicer person overall. Hope it stays that way. Gratz on getting your ref rank back. Anyways,

replies.body: Absolutely one of my best friends back then when I joined the server 2 years ago but I think you were a bit unfair with me once I got demoted, you should've opened your mind more but I don't care at this point, I barely play here anymore. Apart from that you're pretty good at pvp, even with that aussie ping. Did some good and bad things as an admin but you were still one of the best we've ever had
